review_title: Great and innovative organization where you're offered space and a platform to share your ideas and implement them.
pros: The organization welcomes innovative minds thinking outside the box and the atmosphere is generally good and consist on team work.
cons: The pay scale isn't usually the best and it's an organization that focuses on programme grants and has very limited unrestricted funds.

job_title: Project Manager in Casablanca, Greater Casablanca
cons: The organization needs to treat its employees fairly.
